[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1576753181262{margin-top: 20px !important;}”]

Best E-Mountain Bike rides in Europe

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1542118005351{margin-top: 15px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

We showcase our e-mountain bike adventures in Europe.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Putting the spotlight on our European E-mountain bike Destinations

After more than ten years of crafting mountain bike adventures around the world we were delighted to introduce new e-mountain bike trips at the end of 2019. Rather than simply re-purposing our existing mountain bike tours we set out to create all new itineraries perfectly suited to the unique characteristics and benefits of e-mountain bikes.

We currently have five tremendous E-MTB tours in Europe. From the rocky coastline of Croatia, to the dusty Sierra Nevada singletrack in Spain, and the rugged Swiss Alps to the rolling forests of Slovenia.

Here’s the lowdown on our European e-mountain bike adventures and what makes each special:[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Tuscany – ride the good life

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]This spectacular week-long E-MTB tour unlocks the best of Tuscany as you ride on coastal and island singletrack.

Indulge in the most fabulous local food and wine, and learn how viticulture is a huge part of life here in Tuscany.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3027″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3035″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3028″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3034″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]If you’re looking for a real foodie e-mountain bike adventure, with outstanding singletrack and a private pool to return to at the end of the day, it has to be Tuscany. Here are a few special moments you can look forward to:

Tour Highlights

  • Immerse yourself in island life, riding the rust red trails of Elba island
  • Indulge in the finest Tuscan meat, cheeses, vegetables and wine
  • Refresh your legs with a post-ride swim in your private pool
  • Swoop down fast, loose singletrack built by your guides
  • Stroll to breakfast each morning as the mist rises off the olive trees
  • Pedal along the edge of the Tuscan coastline

For all the details on our E-MTB tour Tuscany head to the tour page. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3033″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”3036″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Croatia – the greens and blues of Istria

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Starting in the lush green of inland Istria we’ll weave our way coastward, passing through ancient hilltop villages and bustling harbours before finishing up on the rocky island of Krk.

Riding your E-MTB through the patchwork of Croatian countryside and coastline will have you feeling refreshed and reinvigorated.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5067″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5068″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4968″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5069″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]If you’re looking to immerse yourself in the colourful Mediterranean life of Istria, this E-MTB tour Croatia is for you. From the mountains and forest inland, to the beautiful coastline and islands of the Adriatic, here are a few special moments you can look forward to:

Tour Highlights

  • Wander through charming Venetian towns of blond stucco
  • Take the ferry to Rab, the ‘Happy Island’, to ride the rocky, moonscape trails
  • Watch the sun set over the Adriatic with a glass of local wine in hand
  • Multiple singletrack descents in one day around Grožnjan
  • Relax in the modern spa at your medieval accommodation
  • Feast on local delicacies, like truffles and freshly-caught seafood

For all the details on our E-MTB tour Croatia head to the tour page. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4971″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5071″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Slovenia – From the Alps to the Adriatic

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]You don’t have to travel far to find our next European E-MTB destination, in fact it’s just across the border in Slovenia. Although they might be neighbours the countries and terrain vary vastly with the tours following suit.

Slovenia is the most densely forested country in Europe which, combined with its big mountains and rolling hills, makes it one hell of an E-MTB playground. Still not convinced? Keep scrolling…[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5072″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4952″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]In addition to a sensational, cross-border e-mountain biking tour from the Julian Alps to the Adriatic coast, here are some more special moments that you can look forward to on our E-MTB tour in Slovenia:

Tour Highlights

  • Tasting artisan cheeses made by local shepherds in the mountains
  • Riding and eating in three countries in one day!
  • Learning about the wartime history of this part of Europe
  • Watching the sun set over the Adriatic
  • Riding pristine Alpine singletrack on your E-MTB
  • Enjoy the changes in local cuisine from mountain to sea

Delve into every detail of our E-MTB Slovenia adventure on the tour page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4961″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4962″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Spain – Circumnavigating the Sierra Nevada

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Spain has always been a firm favourite with us. The food, the weather, the culture, the trails… There’s so much to love. Having gathered in Málaga we’ll spend the next seven days weaving our way towards Granada, passing through traditional whitewash villages and sampling the local tapas on the the way.

There’s so much to take in from this vibrant country and an E-MTB is the perfect companion for the job.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5075″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5076″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4939″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5077″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]In addition to fantastic, challenging e-mountain biking through the mountain landscapes and villages of Andalucía, here are some of the other special moments you can look forward to in Southern Spain:

Tour Highlights

  • Feasting on the best local food + wine
  • Staying in comfortable + unique caves in the ‘Badlands’
  • Learning how the world-famous jamón iberico is produced
  • Bar-hopping on a tapas tour of Granada
  • Riding through the streets of the Albaicín, the old gypsy quarter
  • Being immersed into the local way of life in Andalucía
  • Marvelling at the unique geology of the ‘Desierto de los Colorados’

For all the detail on our E-MTB tour Spain head to the tour page. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5078″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”4930″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]

Switzerland – North to south in beautiful Graubünden

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]There’s no country so well equipped and enthusiastic about e-mountain bikes than Switzerland, making it one of the best destinations for E-MTB, with its amazing trails.

With the assistance of your E-MTB and the efficient Swiss lift system we’ll venture high and far into the mountains and back country, ensuring we ride on the finest trails possible over the course of the week.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5080″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5018″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”black” align=”align_left” border_width=”8″ el_width=”10″ css=”.vc_custom_1493823688550{padding-right: 40px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text]This new E-MTB tour in Switzerland is a real must-do for passionate e-mountain bike travellers, combining breath-taking landscapes with world-class trails and true mountain life. Here are some special moments you can look forward to in Switzerland:

Tour Highlights

  • Spend the day riding the IMBA Epic Trail
  • Experience the Italian side of Switzerland in Poschiavo
  • Ride the famous UNESCO Bernina Express train
  • Enjoy mid-ride rösti in traditional mountain huts
  • Relax each evening with a glass in hand in cosy, family-run hotels
  • Round off your adventure on the perfectly-built flow trails of St. Moritz

Delve into every detail of our Swiss E-MTB adventure on the tour page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5081″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”5013″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Check out the best E-MTB rides in Europe – Slovenia, Croatia, Spain and Switzerland!
